column1: 15477347_19,s5,T5,T6,Infection with ,ADAP,-,GFP," further increased conjugation with a two- to threefold shift in binding to APCs (i.e., 7-8 to 20%).",Not_a_complex

15477347_19,s7,T4,T2,These findings indicate that ,ADAP," can enhance conjugate formation of primary murine T cells in a manner analogous to the T8.1 system, and that the loss of the ",SLP-76," binding sites abrogates this effect.
